data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=aKniQ5xsylUQ7kNvgHFZ9wv&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDowTkSnNPdVRbSoDgqVO3Hzow4kyTU0p5Um7Lw2YvkxQ&oe=66FFE58C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=OOS9mRlogdAQ7kNvgE4SRb3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBJZQuSx2jZZ6965X4iq1vpdYx94WZoGF8fbHobIYfStA&oe=66FFE39F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=WTfgpgFKzbYQ7kNvgHWrPrs&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCW-reQHryJNvMz3vRK0e1O-yec_5OvyQOJvEnrX3CjTg&oe=66FFC8F1)
